description:
Doug isn't shy about anything at all!
This 22-year-old is an open book and he was more than happy to answer any question we threw at him.
When asked about his sexual preferences:
"I would say kind of bi-curious, bi-sexual," he said. "Somehwere in there."
About his fantasies:
"I would like to have a threesome with another guy and a girl but have the other guy be bisexual as well."
When he realized he had an interest in guys:
"Looking at porn on the Internet," he said. "I came across 'guy porn' and it kind of tweaked me a little."
I love how he calls it "guy porn!"
title: Doug
